ygData.subject: RE: Bard vs. Paladin, dueling.
ygData.msgSnippet: i know i could do that, but i feel cheap doing it in a duel.  with a mob i don t mind, but in a duel i don t want any excuses from them when they lose. i
ygData.messageBody:
i know i could do that, but i feel cheap doing it in a duel. with a mob i
don't mind, but in a duel i don't want any excuses from them when they lose.
i chain/feared a shaman once and he vowed never to duel me again. i
promised not to and killed him anyway, but you get my point. i expect to
lose against a melee class. i expect to win against a caster. but both
ways i will stand my ground! =)

Shada


> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> Umm Shada... you need to take advice from me for once.
> =)
>
> DON'T STAND STILL=)
>
> Move around, run around behind them, slow them down with
> chains, Blast them
> with an AE damage song, run around some more. Don't ever
> stand still and let
> them hit you. always keep moving, never stop. do not try and
> out fight a
> tank. use your damage songs and keep moving=)
>
>
> Then when they are at 200 or so HP, DIRGE them=)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
